attributes.action: Stop mega solar schemes destroying our countryside - solar on roofs not farmland
attributes.additional_details: Large areas of countryside are threatened by these enormous developments,which would ruin the landscape for decades to come.
attributes.background: Promote solar energy on roofs and put an end to large-scale solar schemes which industrialize farmland and open countryside

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/701293
